screenshot.caption: SHOW file open in Hancom Thinkfree Office NEO Show

description: When you create a show document in Show you can choose to save it as various types of files, including a PowerPoint presentation ( .PPTX ), OpenDocument presentation ( .ODP ), or Show document (SHOW). SHOW files are commonly used for creating classroom presentations, picture shows, and financial reports. You can also save the show document as a .JPG , .GIF , .BMP , or .TIF image.
Show is one of three applications available in the Thinkfree Office NEO suite, which is similar to the Microsoft Office suite. The following applications are included in Thinkfree Office NEO:
